Module Stacking Penalties
1 - 100%, 2 - 87%, 3 - 57%, 4 - 28%, 5 - 10.5%

Modules/Weaponry to counter Enemies
Enemies ------- Hardener to use -- Damage type to use

Blood Raider --- EM/Thermal ------- EM
Guristas ------- Kinetic/Thermal -- Kinetic
Sanshas ------- EM/Thermal ------- EM
Serpentis ------ Thermal/Kinetic -- Kinetic
Angel ---------- Expl/Kin --------- Explosive
Mordus --------- Kinetic/Thermal -- Kinetic
Rogue Drones --- Expl/Kinetic ----- EM
Mercenary ------- EM/Therm --------- Thermal
Minmatar ------ All Resis -------- Thermal (sec. Explosive)
Gallente ------- Kinetic/Thermal -- Thermal (sec. EM)
Amarr --------- EM/Thermal ------- Thermal
Caldari --------- Kinetic/Thermal -- Kinetic
The Seven ----- All Resis -------- Thermal
EoM ----------- Kinetic/Thermal -- Kinetic

ECM Jamming ------ Guristas/Caldari
Sensor Dampener -- Serpentis
Target Painter ----- Angel
Tracking Disruptor -- Sanshas/Blood Raider
Energy Vampire --- Amarr/Blood Raider

Kinetic - Hornet/Vespa - Scourge
Thermal - Hobgoblin/Hammerhead - Inferno
Explosive - Warrior/Valkyrie - Nova
EM - Acolythe/Infiltrator - Mjolnir
